thread.title: 「霞ヶ関カンツリー倶楽部」の女性差別、IOCが問題視 東京五輪ゴルフ会場
thread.title_full: 「霞ヶ関カンツリー倶楽部」の女性差別、IOCが問題視 東京五輪ゴルフ会場

author: The Huffington Post
title: 「霞ヶ関カンツリー倶楽部」の女性差別、IOCが問題視 東京五輪ゴルフ会場
text:   KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 10: A general view of the final group walking down the 13th fairway during the final round of the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 10, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 08: Abel Tam Yuan of Malaysia hits a shot on the 17th hole during the second round of the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 8, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 08: Kyung-hoon Lee of Korea hits a shot on the 5th hole during the second round of the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 8, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 08: Ben Campbell of New Zealand watches his tee shot on the 16th hole during the second round of the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 8, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 08: Ben Campbell of New Zealand hits a shot on the 17th hole during the second round of the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 8, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 10: Hideki Matsuyama of Japan hits a shot from the fairway on the 5th hole during the final round of the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 10, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 10: (L-R) Hideki Matsuyama of Japan and Tarquin MacManus of Australia play the 13th hole during the final round of the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 10, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 10: Tarquin MacManus of Australia watches a shot on the 15th fairway during the final round of the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 10, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 10: Tarquin MacManus of Australia walks down the 15th fairway during the final round of the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 10, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 10: Ben Campbell of New Zealand watches his tee shot on the 17th hole during the final round of the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 10, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 10: Yosuke Asaji of Japan watches his tee shot during the final round of the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 10, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 10: Yosuke Asaji of Japan watches his tee shot during the final round of the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 10, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 10: Tarquin MacManus of Australia hits a shot on the 5th fairway during the final round of the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 10, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) KAWAGOE, JAPAN - JANUARY 31: (CHINA OUT, SOUTH KOREA OUT) The club house of the Kasumigaseki Country Club is seen on January 31, 2017 in Kawagoe, Saitama, Japan. A private golf club selected as the golf venue for the 2020 Tokyo Olympics has defended its practice of excluding women as full members, saying that it allows females to play the course on Sundays. According to the Tokyo organizer, the International Olympic Committee in January demanded in writing the club change its policy on female membership. It stated that the club's membership practice violates the spirit of the IOC, as it breaches the fundamental principles of the Olympic Charter that bans any form of discrimination, including by gender. Hiroshi Imaizumi, general manager of the club, said that he has submitted a report to the Tokyo organizing committee denying any wrongdoing. The club has about 1,250 full members, who are all male. (Photo by The Asahi Shimbun via Getty Images) People play golf at Kasumigaseki Country Club in Kawagoe, Saitama Prefecture, Japan, January 25, 2017. REUTERS/Oh Hyun KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 10: Hideki Matsuyama of Japan celebrates after winning the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 10, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 08: Matt Jager of Australia practices his swing on the 10th hole during the second round of the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 8, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) KAWAGOE CITY, JAPAN - OCTOBER 08: Tze Huang Choo of Singapore hits a chip shot on the 7th hole during the second round of the 2010 Asian Amateur Championship at Kasumigaseki Country Club on October 8, 2010 in Kawagoe City, Japan. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images)  シェア
